entry.title: War Of Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: miladystark

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,234Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 150

Summary: Lieutenant Commander Evan Buckley has survived war zones, covert missions, and enough explosions to fill a lifetime—but nothing prepared him for Staff Sergeant Eddie Diaz, the army medic with a sharp tongue and zero regard for rank.They clash, they fight, they bleed—and somewhere between they start to fall. Slowly. Stupidly. Against all odds. Because in a world where every second counts, love is the one thing they never trained for. Sergeant Eddie Diaz didn’t look up until he heard boots and yelling.“Careful!” he said, deadpan, as the team deposited Buck—still resisting—onto the cot. “We wouldn’t want to bruise his ego any further.”“You’re the medic?” Buck growled, glaring up at the man with messy curls and sharp eyes.“No,” Eddie replied dryly, pulling on gloves. “I’m the fairy godmother. You got a wish?”

entry.title: True Loves Kiss
entry.summary:
Author: BuddiefanRPNJ

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,145Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Buck inadvertently triggers a curse when he breaks the arm of Billy Boil's skeleton. It starts with a dislocated shoulder and progresses into boils growing all over his face. Eddie tries to be the supportive best friend while pining and trying to put his life back together.Christopher finds out what happened, and while talking to his father, suggests that True Love's Kiss will be able to break the curse on Buck.Featuring a sassy teen who is done with his dad's dancing around each other, a Buck who just maybe isn't as oblivious as everyone thinks, and an Eddie who has almost fully accepted himself, but spirals a bit along the way.

entry.title: Through Fire and Time II (9-1-1 x 9-1-1: Lone Star Fanfic)
entry.summary:
Author: actuallynate

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 75,153Chapters: 19/32Kudos: 42

Summary: Same number, different city.Elliot "Eli" Hayes thought he had found stability and belonging with the 126 in Austin - a firehouse that helped him heal from his past and grow into his role as a paramedic. But life, as unpredictable as ever, throws him a curveball when a sudden reshuffle forces him to temporarily leave the comfort of the firehouse family and take up a position with the 118 in Los Angeles.Returning to his hometown stirs up old memories, unresolved grief, and unexpected challenges. With his panic disorder still a lingering shadow, Eli must navigate the dynamic and high-pressure environment of the 118 while proving himself to a new team.Meanwhile, his close friend, Ravi Panikkar, struggles to find his footing at the 252 firehouse in New York under the shadow of Captain Sal Deluca, a once respected leader whose toxic ways threaten to unravel Ravi's confidence and safety.TRIGGER WARNING: This story contains themes of panic disorder, hypochondria, and anxiety attacks, as well as references to trauma, medical procedures, suicide, drug names and high-stress emergency situations. Reader discretion is advised.

entry.title: you can see it with the lights out
entry.summary:
Author: lesbianedmundo

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,514Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 30

Summary: “I’m not making you sleep on the couch in your own house.” Buck protests.Eddie’s gaze softens. “It’s your house, technically.”“Not anymore.” His voice cracks as he says it.Eyebrows curving in concern, Eddie walks over to Buck. He’s still got a blanket in one hand. “Buck,” Eddie starts. Stops. His face is tight. With something. It’s been a long time since anything about Eddie was unreadable to Buck, but this - he doesn’t know.“Take the bed.”Eddie laughs, moment broken. “I’m not taking your bed.”“Fine then.” Buck finds himself saying even as his brain starts screaming at him to stop. “We both fit, don’t we?”It’s quiet.“Okay.” Eddie whispers.Buck doesn’t know why this feels like a victory, in a way that’s inherently deeper than just winning a minor disagreement. Or, Eddie and Christopher come home. Buck is obviously so normal about sharing a house with them.

entry.summary:

And the team had welcomed him back, Bobby especially despite the fact that during the first few shifts the man had looked more than a little tense, his eyes constantly straying back to Buck as if he was terrified something would go wrong and he’d get hurt again....Buck is back where he belongs. entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,004Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 186

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: And somehow, I found my way back to you
entry.summary:
Author: mostly_luminous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 65,719Chapters: 9/10Kudos: 62

Summary: Evan Buckley hides his pain to avoid burdening others, always putting their needs first. Seen as strong and dependable, he silently struggles while earning praise for having it all together. But no one realizes the emotional cost of being the one everyone relies on—because he never shows how broken he really feels inside.And then, he just wants to stop. Maybe start something new. Somewhere far.So, he left... the 118, his sister, LA.... Eddie.And after 2 years, he still found his way to them........to him.

entry.title: Never Let Me Go ( A Sinner Like Me)
entry.summary:
Author: colescharms

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 158,070Chapters: 37/?Kudos: 283

Summary: When infamous rockstar Evan “Buck” Buckley gets injured (again), his label hires Army vet-turned-EMT Eddie Diaz to shadow him on tour. Eddie’s job is simple: keep Buck breathing. But nothing about Buck is simple—not his smile, not his secrets, and definitely not the way he starts to feel like home.Eddie’s supposed to keep Buck safe. Buck’s supposed to stay out of trouble. But somewhere between motel parking lots, midnight emergency calls, and songs that sound too much like confessions, lines blur—and hearts get caught in the wreckage.This tour might save Buck’s career. It might ruin Eddie’s life. Or maybe, if they’re lucky, it could be the start of something louder than either of them expected.

entry.title: The Family he made
entry.summary:
Author: AliciaSteinke15

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 197,519Chapters: 55/?Kudos: 921

Summary: When Buck left the Navy Seals he went to Chicago and became a firefighter. While in Chicago, Buck started at FireHouse 51 where he met Kelly Severide and fell in love with him. Two years after asking out Severide, Andy Darden dies and Kelly gets hurt and goes off the deep end but they get through it. A lot happened Buck and Kelly got married but when Shay dies everything changes. Kelly goes off the deep end again but it's worse this time. Buck tries to help but Kelly keeps pushing him away so one day Buck goes to Cheif Wallace Boden and asked to be transferred to another station in LA. When he tells Kelly to see if he will stop him, he doesn't. Kelly lets the love of his life and husband walk out the door with his wedding ring in Kelly's hand. When Buck gets to LA he joins FireHouse 118 and changes himself.This is the Story of how Evan "Buck" Buckley-Severide became Evan "Buck" Buckley

entry.title: thank you, frank
entry.summary:
Author: harrysupperleftnipple

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,866Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 27

Summary: And that was it. Eddie knew right then: he was in love with his best friend. He might not have had the exact words for it, but he knew that his entire being was connected to Buck and that it would never change.So, of course, looking at Buck’s Hinge matches and helping him choose one to go on a date with does not help Eddie’s feelings. It actually makes them quite worse. Eddie never thought of himself as a particularly jealous person, but he also didn’t think that he was hopelessly in love with his best friend either. Things change.---Or: While in El Paso, Eddie has some realizations and has come to some conclusions with Frank's help. Back in LA, Buck is trying to kill Eddie when he suggests that they look at each other's Hinge profiles and pick out dates for each other.

entry.title: Like yours were the arms that the whole world was in
entry.summary:
Author: s_bi_derman

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,260Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Eddie leaned his head back against the couch, watching Buck as he did the same. These late Friday nights had become commonplace now that they lived together, drinking a few beers on the couch together. Some show droned on on the TV, but Eddie was more interested in watching the light flicker across Buck's face. They were both past tipsy, well on their way to drunk, at this point in the night. But it was Friday, and the first night of 48 hours off. Eddie felt at peace in a way he rarely did before Buck moved in."So, you did competitive ballroom dancing?" Buck asks, tilting his head toward Eddie.-An impromptu late-night dance leads Buck and Eddie to confront feelings they thought they could leave unsaid.

entry.title: ear ache
entry.summary:
Author: coldriddendevastation

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,120Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 79

Summary: operation: get eddie his hoodie back. (and maybe don’t collapse from fever while he’s at it).__The look Hen gives him is clearly worried, especially when Buck doesn’t offer anything beyond mumbling, “Need t’ find Eddie.”Bobby’s left hand finds the small of his back and stays there. Buck is led down the stairs, the younger firefighter’s hand shooting out and grabbing the rail. Definitely sick. “Got his… stuff.” He gestures lamely at himself, and Hen doesn’t bother disguising her fond sigh.“You can give it back to him tomorrow,” Bobby soothes, his other hand joining the first as Buck stumbles down the final stair and just barely manages to catch himself.

entry.title: the curious case of the firefighters at pickup time
entry.summary:
Author: davidfincher (ethelscain)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,154Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 121

Summary: She sees Evan and Eddie again, and she’s really helpless, because she really, really wants to know if they’re together or not. She thinks about just dropping a “your son” while talking to Evan, just to see how he reacts. On Christopher’s paperwork - or so she'd heard - Buck wasn't listed as a parent, but Kayla’s been in LA long enough to know a title doesn’t mean anything.The two really act like a couple, for what it’s worth. They’re almost entirely in sync, working seamlessly together to lure a kindergartener, three middle schoolers and a teenager into the car.“I don’t know why I couldn’t just walk home,” The teenager–Harry, of course, whines.“What, you don’t think we’re cool anymore?” Eddie retorts.OR: 5 times teachers are confused by the 118's relationships, and 1 time they figure it out (and so do buck and eddie)
